subject: Sir,
body:
Sir,
With sincere apology I seek your attention.I got your email contact on Europe email leads with your name.My name Mr Hamza Mohammed,i am a financial consultant.
I have been details by late president Mahamat Deby Idriss of Chad republic family about his looted funds in million of dollars in different financial institutions in Europe.I want to know if you are credible to take possession of Investment Manager on behalf of the family.Don't hesitate to revert if you are interested.
Best regards.
Mr Hamza

subject: Re:   Sir,
body:
Hello Mr. Hamza,

I hope this message finds you well. I am intrigued by your proposal and would like to learn more about it. Could you please provide me with more details? For instance, what kind of investments are we talking about? And how did the late president's family come to choose me for this task?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Shirley

subject: Re:   Sir,
body:
Mr. Shirley,
For security reason the family is very careful who to approach anybody fiscally. We considered it more safe and trusted to locate a neutral body to fix trust with him or her. Basically the family is interested in a sound ideas that can be transmitted in future for a steady cash flow. Hence we adopted the options to seek for partnership online via the use of internet search there your contact was discovered i send the proposal to you.
If you are competent to handle this transaction we can proceed then our private trusty firm will send the sum of $250m to your company account. Kindly revert asap to proceed on the procedures.
Mr. Hamza

subject: Re:   Sir,

Lastly, I noticed that there seems to be a lot of emphasis on protection and avoiding any issues with financial monitoring agencies. Could you elaborate more on why this is important?
